name: Journey To The Centre of the Earth
name_original: Journey To The Centre of the Earth
description:
A game with a simple goal, how deep can you go? What will you find? It's for you to discover...

CONTROLS - IMPORTANT - Arrow Keys or WASD to move, SPACE to parachute

Made for the Ludum Dare 48, with the theme Deeper & Deeper in 72 hours.

Scripts and Music - MegaSharkx1(Itch.io), MegaShark(ldjam.com) Art - Samashee(ldjam.com)
